fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce

Interface MapReduceResultReceptionI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapReduceResultReceptionCI

    public interface MapReduceResultReceptionI
    The interface ReductionResultReceptionI defines the method to be used to receive the result of reductions that have been executed asynchronously.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptResult(java.lang.String computationURI, java.lang.String emitterId, java.io.Serializable acc)
      receive the result (accumulator) acc of a reduce computation with URI computationURI from the node emitterId.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptResult

        void acceptResult(java.lang.String computationURI,
                  java.lang.String emitterId,
                  java.io.Serializable acc)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        receive the result (accumulator) acc of a reduce computation with URI computationURI from the node emitterId.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        computationURI - URI of the computation, used to distinguish parallel maps over the same DHT.
        emitterId - a unique identifier allowing the receiver to know from which node this result is coming.
        acc - the result of the reduction phase from the node emitterId.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
